item.title: [PI] xplock commands?-closed-
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

ok so i attempted to add it, i got the 100 errors thing when i compiled…heres wat i have in player.java

public abstract class Player {

	public ArrayList <String>killedPlayers = new ArrayList<String> ();
	public ArrayList <Integer>attackedPlayers = new ArrayList<Integer> ();
	
	public boolean
	xpLock = false,

^^^ just the first part…player.java continued

	public boolean xpLock() {
		if (c.Xplock == false) {
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

now in playerAssistant.java

	public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){
		if(c.xpLock == true) {
		return false;
		}
		if (amount+c.playerXP[skill] < 0 || c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) {
			if(c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) {
				c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
			}
			return false;
		}
		amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS;
		int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
		c.playerXP[skill] += amount;
		if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) {
			if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) && skill != 3 && skill != 5)
				c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
			levelUp(skill);
			c.gfx100(199);
			requestUpdates();
		}
		setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]);
		refreshSkill(skill);
		return true;
	}

now for commands.java

if(playerCommand.equals("xplock")) {
     c.Xplock == true;
     c.sendMessage("Your XP is Locked. To Unlock it, do this command again!);
     return;
} else {
    c.Xplock == false;
    c.sendMessage("Your XP is Unlocked.);
    return;
}
}

oh also playersave.java

                                        } else if (token.equals("Xplock")) {
                                                p.xpLock = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2);

second part

                        characterfile.write("Xplock = ", 0, 9);
                        characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.xpLock), 0, Boolean.toString(p.xpLock).length());

thats wat i have and im getting 100 errors.i think its in my command…anyone help?
